description: More drum fixes. Also, Dan Peters is credited as the drummer on this record, not Dave Grohl.
title: Sliver

description: Fixed tempo and chords on fourth verse
title: Sliver

description: The sound engine cannot read instrument changes in one track, so you can't have both clean and distortion in one guitar track. The last time I tried to do that, I was rewarded in my efforts by being attacked by a pack of no-contribution noobs. Aaaaaanyway, I edited both vocals and simplified the drum track.
title: Sliver
